Literature.Title: Rational design and characterization of cell-selective antimicrobial peptides based on a bioactive peptide from Crocodylus siamensis hemoglobin.
Literature.Author: Sosiangdi S, Taemaitree L, Tankrathok A, Daduang S, Boonlue S, Klaynongsruang S, Jangpromma N

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=896 µg/ml,Human PBMC:50% Cell death=113 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:50% Cell death=200 µg/ml,Mouse fibroblasts 3T3-L1:20% Cytotoxicity =100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC90=15µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 27736(MIC90=75µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 27736(MBC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC90=35µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC90=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=50µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC90=8µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MBC=12µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC90=12µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MBC=25µg/ml)
